laboratory_examinations.findings: Fragmented elastic fibers and disarrangement of collagen; disruption of internal elastic membranes in small arteries.
Aggravation of the dissecting aneurysm, with severe stenosis of the left CCA of more than 90%.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Aggravation of the dissecting aneurysm noted.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Decrease in CBF beyond the infarction; extensive decrease in CBF in the left temporal lobe.
Improvement in the CBF in the left temporal lobe.
Good blood flow with no stenosis of the artery; aneurysm had disappeared.
Artifacts at the proximal and distal ends of the stent in the left CCA.
Good blood flow through the left CCA, with no dissecting aneurysm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Disappearance of the dissecting aneurysm noted.
